name: Dark Quest (itch) (OscarLundberg)
description:
Explore the almost infinite dark caves of Dark Quest! Collect gold and destroy the monsters that stand in your path. If you are persistant you might even find a way down to the lower levels of the cave...

Hints: 

  • Gold and kill count affect the chances of finding shops or a path to the next level.
  • When in a shop, open the stats window (M/Num+) to see the item price.

  • Some monsters drop gold when killed.
  • There are a few different ways to advance to the next level. Can you reach the end?

Controls

Move: WASD /  Numpad (8426)
Fire: Spacebar / Numpad 0
Stats & Map: M / Numpad + (Hold)

The UI buttons next to the game window lets you control layout, render mode and music. For an even more authentic experience, turn music off and individual pixel rendering on.
